question: Which pet would you choose for life?

options.text: A teleporting hedgehog
A singing lizard that only knows 90s pop

question: You must live in one of these places forever:

options.text: A floating castle with no Wi-Fi
A giant underground library where books whisper secrets at night

question: Your superpower has a catch. Choose wisely!

options.text: Invisibility, but you sneeze glitter every time
Flying, but only when telling embarrassing stories aloud

question: Which outfit would you wear to every formal event?

options.text: A tuxedo made of spaghetti
A ballgown that hums circus music as you walk

question: One must become your new laugh:

options.text: A goat’s bleat
A foghorn blast

question: Every time you enter a room...

options.text: Confetti explodes from your pockets
A marching band plays your theme song for 10 seconds

question: Which would you rather battle in a trivia contest?

options.text: A genius raccoon in a tiny suit
An AI toaster with a sass setting on MAX

question: You win a lifetime supply of one item:

options.text: Giant glitter cannons
Croissants that double as walkie-talkies

question: Your phone only does one thing now:

options.text: Summons random ducks
Changes every photo into spaghetti art

question: You must perform in a talent show every week. What’s your act?

options.text: Interpretive dance with baguettes
Opera singing in a shark costume

question: Which magical curse do you accept?

options.text: You hiccup bubbles when nervous
Your shoes moo once an hour

question: Which job do you secretly have at night?

options.text: A fortune-telling squirrel translator
The official unicorn hair stylist

question: Your new roommate is:

options.text: A ghost obsessed with karaoke
A cat that critiques your life choices in Shakespearean English

question: Your alarm clock every morning is now:

options.text: A rooster that raps motivational lyrics
A mime that silently judges you until you wake up

question: You win a game show. Your prize?

options.text: A lifetime supply of glow-in-the-dark socks
A mansion built entirely of cheese

question: Choose your forever mode of transportation:

options.text: A unicycle with jet boosters
A giant inflatable duck that floats through traffic

question: Your new best friend is:

options.text: A grumpy wizard who texts only in riddles
A robot that calls everyone “Captain Snugglepants”

question: Which food becomes sentient and follows you around?

options.text: A jealous taco
A polite but clingy slice of cake

question: Every time you yawn:

options.text: You teleport to a random location within your house
You speak fluent squirrel for 5 seconds

question: One of these follows you everywhere, forever. Choose:

options.text: A tiny choir that sings your thoughts
A slow-motion squirrel clapping for your every move

question: Your laugh is now transformed. Which do you pick?

options.text: A rubber chicken squeak
A dramatic movie trailer voice

question: Every selfie you take turns into:

options.text: A medieval portrait with a dragon in the background
A potato with googly eyes and your smile

question: You can only communicate via one method:

options.text: Shadow puppets
Interpretive kazoo solos

question: Your new pet is extremely loyal but:

options.text: Is a flamingo that insists on wearing tiny boots
A goldfish that dramatically faints whenever you sneeze

question: Your hands are replaced with:

options.text: Miniature disco balls
Tiny fog machines that activate when you’re excited

question: Which would you rather host at your house every weekend?

options.text: A tea party with sarcastic llamas
A trivia night with confused time travelers

question: You must end every sentence with a sound effect. Choose:

options.text: “Boing!”
A thunderclap

question: Your voice now echoes like you’re in a...

options.text: Spooky cave
Glitter-filled stadium

question: Which fashion statement must you wear to every important event?

options.text: A hat shaped like a confused pigeon
Trousers that sing lullabies when you sit down
